dia_brief.name: Tear
dia_brief.txt: I've received a private transmission regarding an anonymous request specifically for you lot.
We are looking for adventurers that are... not concerned with working strictly within the regulations of the guild.
There is a Leosocial research lab located in the Zoram Desert that we have a keen interest in, however it is no surprise that such a facility would be heavily guarded.
This is where you come in. Approach the lab and cause as much of a panic as possible to draw out their defenses.
We should only need a few minutes of distraction, but to ensure that you work sufficiently, your pay will be based on how much damage you cause to the lab.
We hope for a swift reply, and more importantly - results.

dia_brief.name: Tear
dia_brief.txt: A request like this is highly suspect, however it is not my place to decide on your behalf.
Whether you accept or not, I'll be sure to make the proper arrangements, but be sure not to tread lightly with private requests.

dia_intro.name: Tear
dia_intro.txt: The research lab is just up ahead.
A word of warning: getting caught in an act such as this can spell the end of your adventuring career.
There are most likely drones equipped with cameras patrolling the area - given enough time they will be able to record your likeness in high detail and run an ID check with the guild.
You must destroy any you encounter with extreme prejudice.
I can facilitate an emergency escape should it be necessary, however it will result in you abandoning the mission.

dia_intro.name: Imo'lei
dia_intro.txt: I hate schemes like this, but getting out of your comfort zone is a part of adventuring. The sooner I get used to it, the better.

dia_intro.name: Paprika
dia_intro.txt: It's fine! Work is work, right?
Besides, if we didn't do it somebody else would've anyways.

dia_intro.name: Imo'lei
dia_intro.txt: *sigh* Sometimes I almost wish I was as dumb as you. It has its perks.

dia_intro.name: Paprika
dia_intro.txt: Heeheehee~ It's my super special ability!

dia_caught.name: Tear
dia_caught.txt: Watch it! You've got a camera on you!
Damn- I'm getting you out of there!

dia_outro.name: Tear
dia_outro.txt: I just received word from our client - our work here is done. Get out of there before any trouble happens.

dia_outro.name: Paprika
dia_outro.txt: I wonder if they found what they were looking for?

dia_outro.name: Imo'lei
dia_outro.txt: Couldn't care less, all this sneaking around is making my skin crawl.
You couldn't have chimed in at a better time Tear, get us home!
